sources.title: The Wild Women of Wongo
sources.description: Mother Nature and Father Time, as an experiment, put all the beautiful women on one island and all the beautiful men on another. You can find out more about this movie on its IMDB page .

sources.title: The Wild Women of Wongo (1958) [Adventure] [Comedy]
sources.description:
On the tropical island of Wongo, a tribe of beautiful women discover that the other side of the island is inhabited by a tribe of handsome men. They also discover that a tribe of evil ape men live on the island, too, and the ape men are planning a raid on the tribe in order to capture mates.

If you like this movie and our channel, please subscribe: https://goo.gl/atJwQv

sources.title: 1959 - The Wild Women of Wongo - Even the birds and bees are confused..
sources.description:
On the island of Wongo, the women are glamorous and the local men are‚Ä¶ very rugged. Across the water in Goona, it‚Äôs the reverse. A diplomatic visitor arrives, village traditions collide, a crocodile idol must be appeased, and the Wongo women chart a bold course that reshuffles every pairing in sight.

sources.title: Shocker Internet Drive In - Week 57: "Wicked Winter Women" Double Feature
sources.description: Alright - so we know it is too cold for a drive-in feature - at least here in the north east USA, but since when did something like the weather ever stop us! Besides, we thought we would try and warm things up a little with some more "Wild Women". Of course, after the usual coming attractions and a Bugs Bunny cartoon, we proudly bring you that 1958 classic from the sunny land of Florida - "The Wild Women of Wongo". Then, after a our brief intermission, we close out the evening with "Island of Lost Women", featuring a cast of few and Alan Napier - Alfred the Butler from the 1960's Batman TV show. Now, if this doesn't cause you to turn up the heat and visit the snack bar for a bit of hot-toddy, we figure you are dead and we look forward to seeing you in one of our future presentations! http://shockerredirect.tk/ or http://shockerdrivein.freeoda.com/
